scripts.buildTheme: sass css/scss/theme.scss css/scss/theme.css && sass css/scss/theme.scss css/theme.css
scripts.buildAdmin: sass css/scss/admin.scss css/scss/admin.css && sass css/scss/admin.scss css/admin.css
scripts.buildAll: sass css/scss/theme.scss css/scss/theme.css && sass css/scss/theme.scss css/theme.css && sass css/scss/admin.scss css/scss/admin.css && sass css/scss/admin.scss css/admin.css
